Uses of Class
com.google.bitcoin.core.Address

  • Packages that use Address 
    Package Description
    com.google.bitcoin.core  
    com.google.bitcoin.uri  

    • Uses of Address in com.google.bitcoin.core

      Fields in com.google.bitcoin.core declared as Address 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Address Wallet.SendRequest.changeAddress
      "Change" means the difference between the value gathered by a transactions inputs (the size of which you don't really control as it depends on who sent you money), and the value being sent somewhere else.
      Methods in com.google.bitcoin.core that return Address 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Address TransactionInput.getFromAddress()
      Convenience method that returns the from address of this input by parsing the scriptSig.
      Address Script.getFromAddress()
      Convenience wrapper around getPubKey.
      Address Script.getToAddress()
      Gets the destination address from this script, if it's in the required form (see getPubKey).
      Address ECKey.toAddress(NetworkParameters params)
      Returns the address that corresponds to the public part of this ECKey.
      Methods in com.google.bitcoin.core with parameters of type Address 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Transaction.addOutput(BigInteger value, Address address)
      Creates an output based on the given address and value, adds it to this transaction.
      Block Block.createNextBlock(Address to) 
      Block Block.createNextBlock(Address to, BigInteger value) 
      Block Block.createNextBlock(Address to, TransactionOutPoint prevOut) 
      static byte[] Script.createOutputScript(Address to) 
      Transaction Wallet.createSend(Address address, BigInteger nanocoins)
      Statelessly creates a transaction that sends the given value to address.
      Wallet.SendResult Wallet.sendCoins(PeerGroup peerGroup, Address to, BigInteger value)
      Sends coins to the given address, via the given PeerGroup.
      static Wallet.SendRequest Wallet.SendRequest.to(Address destination, BigInteger value) 
      Constructors in com.google.bitcoin.core with parameters of type Address 
      Constructor and Description
      TransactionOutput(NetworkParameters params, Transaction parent, BigInteger value, Address to)
      Creates an output that sends 'value' to the given address (public key hash).
